description: Detects the use of various web request POST or PUT methods (including aliases) via Windows PowerShell command Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Windows PowerShell Upload Web Request
query: (powershell.file.script_block_text:(*Invoke\-WebRequest* OR *iwr\ *) AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*\-Method\ * AND (*\ Put\ * OR *\ Post\ *))
